website_summaries.verdict: Whip up yummy homemade ice cream cones, waffle bowls, and other fancy desserts in mere minutes with this.
pros: Cones come out fresh and tasty
Recipes included are terrific and the appliance is easy to clean
Emits a wonderful aroma while cooking
cons: Could take time to perfect making the bowls
Uneven browning may occur during the process as batter needs to be spread just right

website_summaries.verdict: As if homemade cones weren't fun enough, this CucinaPro unit lets you make waffle cone bowls, too.
pros: Make homemade ice cream cones and waffle bowls in minutes
Includes cone roller and bowl press
Indicator light tells you when waffle is done
Ready in as little as two minutes
cons: You may need to leave the waffle in the iron a little longer than indicated to get all the moisture out

website_summaries.verdict: A quality way to make waffle bowls that replicate the ice cream shop style bowls you're used to.
pros: Similar in quality and style to a waffle bowl you would order at an ice cream shop
Pre-heating the waffle bowl maker provides the best end results
Cook time per waffle is roughly 3 to 4 minutes
Doesn't take much longer than that to form and cool the bowls, either
cons: The machine makes one flat, thin waffle and you have to form the bowl shape yourself
A bit of a learning curve

customer_reviews.title: Waffle Ice Cream Tacos! It's a Thing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING!!! I am not using it to make waffle cones or bowls. I am using it to make Waffle Ice Cream Tacos and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: desertfox

customer_reviews.title: The kids and I love this
customer_reviews.text: We have been having a blast making waffle cones with this, as well as crepes. I was concerned that even the picture on the box shows very uneven browning on the cones, and that is mostly true, it does cook a bit unevenly around the outer edge. But, if you let the waffle cones cook for about 30 seconds longer than in the recipe, they come out golden brown and crisp when they dry. Oh, and really do turn it on before you start mixing the batter: it takes a really long time to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: i got this to make stroopwafels, and it works like a charm. cannot wait till my daughter is a bit older and we can make ice cream cones (and ice cream).
customer_reviews.author: e.e.drew

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: We tried to use this and it heats on one side but not the other. Not usable at all. I didn't try to use it until after the 30 day time period to return but I hope they will make this good.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cooks unevenly
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun appliance. It’s not the highest quality. Seems to have a hot-spot on one side of the unit that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: PappyVanWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Homemade gluten free cones. Woohoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amaaaazing!!! These make the perfect waffle cones! My daughter has celiac disease so we used all purpose gluten free flour and followed the manual’s recipe and it was perfect. My girls LOVE their waffle cones and bowls. I think this is one of my most favorite kitchen gadgets ever.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Heats unevenly
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, but as some others have pointed out it heats very, very unevenly. One side is nearing burnt while the other side is still soft like a regular waffle. I think I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: CampianA

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: The cone maker is a bit small to maneuver easily & is very slippery which is great for cleaning , but difficult to hang on to to manipulate the waffle to make the cones.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve ....
customer_reviews.text: Although it's fairly easy to use, there is a bit of a learning curve to get the texture of the waffle just right to form the bowls. Cones were a bit easier although it still takes a couple of tries to get the right size cone. All in all, cones come out delicious and make for a fun time with the kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year old daughter, who loves anything baking. The recipe for waffle cones is easy to follow, and has been extremely successful. We even adapted to using gluten free flour, and I swear it made even better cones!! We love this machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Woods Mom

customer_reviews.title: But I'm disappointed it did not come with the cone roller
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine. But I'm disappointed it did not come with the cone roller... I took everything out of the box and the roller is missing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home made Waffle cones and baskets
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. At the beginning the waffle was breaking when shaping with the basket and the cone wasn't sealing completely. It required adjustments in the recipe and tried different recipes but once I got it works perfect and my son loves to it this with or without ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: C.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing that for the price it makes good waffles. If you want them a little more crispy,, leave it in a while longer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Good cooking but difficult to open the lid
customer_reviews.text: Good cooking but difficult to open the lid, remains sticky even if we put oil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but cones don’t harden even after following instructions meticulously
customer_reviews.text: I followed the recipe that came with the product and my only disappointment is that the waffles do not harden for use as an ice cream cone.
customer_reviews.author: Thethe

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: A fun tool to have in the kitchen. We love ice cream and these are easy to make quickly to go with any ice cream! The recipe is light and crunchy and easy to make. Fun party favor to bring to any party.
customer_reviews.author: Audrie

customer_reviews.title: Waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: It tends to stick a little if use too much better. Other than that is great
customer_reviews.author: Cat daddy

customer_reviews.title: Waffel cone maker
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make icecream cones, Keto and gluton free. My only complaint is that the cones did not brown evenly. It seems to be hotter in some areas. It worked okay though. They tasted fine!
customer_reviews.author: Happyheart

customer_reviews.title: It requires some skill/practice.
customer_reviews.text: I broke the 1st bowl i tried. And don't make the waffles thick or the wont dry hard to keep a cone shape. But in theory, we love this contraption. I don't know if I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Y

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly after a few trial runs
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this! We were skeptical at first, but this works like a charm! We will never be buying cones again.
customer_reviews.author: Hap Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a well made product
customer_reviews.text: The plastic used to hold the waffle bowl press together broke after first use. The plastic parts inside broke and now the waffle come out half burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Unique family dessert activity!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Makes for a fun family activity. We’ve used it many times for parties or pot lucks too! Unique and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martone

customer_reviews.title: Non stick not great
customer_reviews.text: I eat oil free which is the reason I bought a non stick surface - this sticks quite a bit
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to get these made the 1st time trying.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was the recipe that I used to be fair ... I wanted chocolate ... rolling the cone after you pick up the hot “cookie” takes some practice ... the bowl kept breaking/tearing as I brought the “cover” over the “cup” ...
customer_reviews.author: OOH

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Was not near as easy as it says it is to make. I would send it back, but I was a day late trying to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzosgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for the price, we use it to make taco shells and If we get the correct timing down it won't really stick
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bay

customer_reviews.title: Crappy!!
customer_reviews.text: Never heated up! Could not use it right out of the box! Sent to a friend to use for a birthday party in September...... plugged in and did not work! NOW it’s to late to return . First tried on9/20/2020 ! I want my money back or one that works!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Kobey

customer_reviews.title: Waffle cone
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make keto types of bread or sweet big crackers. The waffles cones are delicious and they are ready in minutes. Also do type of veggies pita bread and they are delicious and super healthy. I will definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of use and cleaning. The included recipe is simple and great tasting, I added vanilla flavoring didn’t even need ice cream to fill cones. Everyone loves eating the cones like a cookie.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Yummy recipe. I added two cap fulls of vanilla. Just like having your own ice cream shop!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a returned item, and it is missing the bowl. Just didn't bother returning it.
customer_reviews.author: mlc

customer_reviews.title: Life love lough
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and enjoy your home making different bread ! Yummy
customer_reviews.author: Hamed California

customer_reviews.title: Uneven temperature
customer_reviews.text: Uneven temperature . Easy to get burn on the side while the center is not cooked. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: MinhThyLe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: Does not cook evenly. Cones look very blotchy. One side burns and the other side is too thick
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Just Do It! We
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Recipe enclosed tasted just like Marble Slab’s!! Perfected the bowl but my cones need practice.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McDonough

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun waffle cone and bowl maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun waffle cone and bowl maker. Easy to use , once you practice a bit. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Schultz

customer_reviews.title: There is no holder for cone roller in my package!
customer_reviews.text: There is no holder for cone roller in my package!
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product! It made one waffle and died on me!! Wouldn't get hot enough to cook them! Batter stayed soft. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks like it's used
customer_reviews.text: my daughter was so excited to use this but when I opened the box, looks like it's used, the package wasn't neat like item when you buy anything new, no instructions, the top surface looks like it was wipe down w/ wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanett N.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok for the price, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Uneven heating, but for the rest it is OK. You can still make waffle cones. But I didn't manage to make them like commercial ones.
customer_reviews.author: YuZa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The box was ripping and falling apart when delivered to me.
customer_reviews.author: Matilde

customer_reviews.title: She is French and into crepes and making things like fresh waffle cones
customer_reviews.text: Gift for Daughter in law..... my son opened it and tried it out. He loves it. She is French and into crepes and making things like fresh waffle cones..... so this will be a hit!
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other brand I have ordered from Amazon but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works better than other brand I have ordered from Amazon but there is no temperature control and it takes too long. Also it doesn't make even waffles as you can see on pictures that I have attached. So I guess I'll keep this one as it's better than nothing but will be looking for some other brand to upgrade this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Sophia

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use, great results
customer_reviews.text: I have a few expensive specialty cookie irons, but decided to give this cone maker a try. Boy, am I glad I did! It makes terrific cones with the included recipe. I was able to make a perfect cone in about 2 minutes with no issues with the batter sticking. This machine performs better than one of my fancy imported irons that cost 4 x as much and sticks anything I bake in it like chewing gum. This iron was easy to use, easy to clean and does not take up much room. Along with making waffle cones and bowls, I'll be using it to make Dutch stroopwafels.
customer_reviews.author: J. StumpfelTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy it crispy with natural aroma mixed by butter and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very fast delivery and well packaged. I made waffle vcones by the recipe. It only takes one and half minutes to make a crispy cone. I enjoy it crispy with natural aroma mixed by butter and egg. My question is how to make it equally golden brown? And this is why I give the product four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very uneven cooking and difficult to shape cones. Might try making bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Seward

customer_reviews.title: Do you want a good product?
customer_reviews.text: You want a well made waffle maker that cooks the dough evenly and can get you a good and consistent result? Then get something else. This isn’t well made, even the plastic got some bubbles on it. And even waffle comes out as unique as a snow flake
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Really slow
customer_reviews.text: We used Krusteaz waffle cone mix and made the bowls, they were yummy. The only problem is that it takes 5 minutes for each one not two minutes as the instructions say. Start early if you're making more than a few.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it to make keto ice cream cones and waffle cookies since Christmas and it has been a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: This is the bees knees.
customer_reviews.text: This iron works as well as promised . I followed directions and used their recipe. We made the bowls and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes homemade ice cream and we do not want store bought cones so we got this waffle cone maker and it works perfectly to make crispy waffle cones.
customer_reviews.author: ecowarrior

customer_reviews.title: So simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So simple and easy to use! Love that I can male my own waffle cones at home.
customer_reviews.author: OlivaAnn

customer_reviews.title: An ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cook very evenly. Opened and turned multiple times. Waffle cones still taste great but take longer to cook than expected.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: The waffle cooks fine but the accessories won’t work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m still learning and I can’t get the cone to shape right. The waffle cooks fine but the accessories won’t work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi D

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few batches of practice
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to learn how to pour on mix and for how long. The middle cooks it way faster than the edges.
customer_reviews.author: maak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got one & easy to use & I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product and fun to make different kinds of cones
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use..
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this, it's too hard to use. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for us. I did get the batter a little to thin the first time and there was holes in them and were hard to roll, but after making it thicker they turned out perfect. We don't care that the color is consistant. They are very good and a really big hit with our family.
customer_reviews.author: G R Lenehan

customer_reviews.title: The waffle surface is not baking evenly
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with. The waffle surface is not baking evenly. The center of waffle stills be light, however, the edge becomes dark brown. Plastic to gets yellow near the baking surface. There is too much condensate into the maker. And the waffle maker drys out a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Goluptious

customer_reviews.title: The Cup Mold Rips the Waffle
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make cones and cups and found that when I use the recipe for the ups, the mold would rip the waffle and make it useless for Ice Cream. I have had to leave the waffle under done and not close the cup mold all the way and fold the waffle to avoid ripping them. The waffle make works well so I give it 50% for that but zero for the cup mold. 3 Stars
customer_reviews.author: deaniam2

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have made cones with this machine. It is easy except the plastic form is useless in shaping the cone. The cones become soft and are not good for ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage..
customer_reviews.text: Garbage...waste of money...I tried to complain to the company...they use a ploy of giving an email address which does not exist...made in China....run as fast as you can...the directions do not match up to the item....total rip off...by American made.
customer_reviews.author: Russell C.

product_meta.title: Waffle Cone and Bowl Maker- Includes Shaper Roller and Bowl Press- Homemade Ice Cream Cone Iron Machine - Summer Gift Giving or Entertaining Fun
feature_bullets: Waffle Cone Maker - Make homemade ice cream bowls and cones in minutes! Or choose to make stroopwaffles
Waffle Bowl Maker - 100% Non-stick plates for easy clean-up.
Waffle Cone Roller - Includes one cone roller to form delicious waffle cones or stroopwafles.
Waffle Bowl Shaper - The only Bowl Maker that includes a bowl press to form your waffle bowls.
Top Selling Party Gift - Waffle iron kitchen appliance gift also makes stroopwafels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars320 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
